h1: How Many Calories in HEB Popcorn?
assumptions: One serving (3 cups popped, 28 g) of HEB butter-flavored microwave popcorn, prepared as directed without extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand specifics, preparation method, and serving size. Check HEB packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One serving of HEB butter popcorn provides about 150 kcal and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp melted butter per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of HEB popcorn?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal for a 28 g serving of butter-flavored HEB popcorn.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in HEB popcorn?
faqs.a: One serving has 19 g carbs, including 3 g fiber and 0 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is HEB popcorn high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, a serving contains 320 mg sodium due to the butter flavoring.

faqs.q: How does HEB popcorn compare to plain popcorn calories?
faqs.a: Butter-flavored is higher at 150 kcal per serving vs. 60 kcal for plain air-popped.

faqs.q: Can I eat HEB popcorn on a low-fat diet?
faqs.a: Opt for light or plain versions to reduce fat from 8 g to under 2 g per serving.
